channel.title: 4chan threads from multiple boards
channel.description: Threads from multiple boards with more than 30 replies

item.title: [ 36] /co/ General Drawthread
item.description:
>Provide References for all requested characters and keep them to one image/post
>Keep requests /co/ related and keep them concise.
>General OC discussion belongs in "Work on your art" and the Donut Steel threads.
>However, OC requests are allowed as long as they aren't /trash/ material or fanfiction. If it's not /coc/ you must provide a link to the comic or cartoon.
>Be patient and take it easy! Don't forget to check the booru to see if your request was filled.
>Drawfriends, don't hold back.
>If a post breaks the rules, DO report and hide it. DON'T respond to it.
>Keep art critique short, otherwise take it to the Batman thread.
>No one is entitled to a request delivery.
>Don't bump or "second", "third", etc. requests. They eat up the post limit.
>No spam.
>Don't fight spam with spam.
>No begging.
>No AI deliveries, no AI discussion. Take them where they're wanted.
>To make the new Drawthread, wait for page 10 at bump limit.
>Have fun!

>Collection of Deliveries:
https://co.llection.pics/

>Drawfriends Gallery List:
rentry.org/txf8t

NSFW deliveries and requests should be posted in:
>>>/aco/drawthread
or
>>>/i/795305

Previous thread: >>148336466

item.title: [256] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE.
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases.
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped.
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Build_a_PC

>CASE (from $ to $$$)
mATX: Asus Prime AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini
ATX: Phanteks XT PRO (ULTRA), Montech AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lian Li Lancool 207, Antec C8, Antec Flux Pro
AVOID: NXZT, 'Silent' cases, fanless cases, Corsair 6500

>CPU
Budget: 9600X, 7600X, 7500f
Gaming: AMD X3D
Workstation: 9950X, 7950X
AVOID Shittel

>COOLER
AIO: Best Value: Thermalright Frozen Prism, Premium LCD: Lian Li Galahad II LCD
Double towers: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE, Noctua NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Scythe Fuma 3/TR AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
ASRock B850M-X, ASRock B850 LiveMixer WiFi, ASRock X870 Pro RS, ASRock Phantom Gaming X870E Nova WiFi
ONLY BUY ASROCK MOBOS

>RAM
DDR4: 2x16GB 3200CL16. Budget, 2x8GB
DDR5: 2x16GB 6000CL30
Workstation/high end: consider 2x32GB

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: Silicon Power UD90
Mid range: SN770
Premium: SN850X
Flagship: Sabrent Rocket 5
DO NOT: Overspend on gen 5 ssds, or cache for non workstation builds.

>GPU
1080p: No VRAM: RTX 5060 and RTX 5060 TI 8GB, Fake Frames: RTX 5060 TI 16GB, Real Performance: RX 9060 XT
1440p: Fake Frames: RTX 5070 TI, Real Performance: RX 9070 XT, Budget: RX 9060 XT
4K: Fire Starter: RTX 5090, Scam Enjoyer: RTX 5080, Affordable: 9070 XT
Workstation: AVOID AMD cards
Value For Money: AVOID Ngreedia cards
ALWAYS pair AMD GPUs with AMD CPUs for SAM https://imgur.com/a/7XecPGL

>PSU
PSU buying guide:
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
https://pcmonitors.info/recommendations/

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>>/g/fwt

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid range: Arctic P12/P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

Previous: >>105086056

Original filename: koq4296xxv621.png

item.title: [107] Death Stranding 2
item.description:
is anyone excited for this? I'm seeing very little talk of it, even on Xitter, where most discussion around Kojima is if he likes the lastest movie on cinema or not.
I liked the first game well enough, but I'm not exactly craving more of it, also, I thin this sequel is making of of the weaknesses of this kind of game clear, the fact that several important characters that didn't die in the original game won't be returning due to their actors being too expensive or busy, like Del Toro's Deadman and and Qualley's Lockne.

Original filename: Death Stranding 2.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 62] KFC'S USA Collapse
item.description:
KFC is now behind Raising Cane's and Wingstop in sales in the USA, and might not exist for much longer.
While their parent company has increase sales, all other major chicken chains have increased sales, and even KFC internationally is increasing sales, KFC sales dropped 4% in 2024. They are now #23 in sales for chain restaurants and #5 for chicken-focused brands, behind Raising Cane's and Wingstop.
Regardless if they are outdated or their low-quality shit might fly in Europe and Asia but not the USA competitive market, KFC's nosediving in interest might eventually mean a complete collapse in the USA market that they'd have to withdraw from.
https://www.restaurantdive.com/news/kfc-raising-canes-wingstop-us-chicken-market-share/745868/

Original filename: re42.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [111] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 179:I Hate Hump Day Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread: >>57714510

Original filename: I Hate Hump Day.jpg
item.author: Alice Anon

item.title: [230] /ptg/ - Private Trackers General
item.description:
ed2k on AmigaOS edition

>Not sure what private trackers are all about?
The mission of /ptg/ is to promote the highest possible standards of tracker service by providing members with opportunities for professional development, by recognizing technical competence through examinations and by advancing the interests of its members.

>Have a question?
- WIKI https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Private_trackers
- PYRAMID (Updated 2021-08-22) https://i.imgur.com/akrkAyV.png
- CHINESE PYRAMID https://i.imgur.com/OxZO5wB.png
- Spreadsheet https://hdvinnie.github.io/Private-Trackers-Spreadsheet/
- IRC irc://irc.sageru.org#ptg

Use >>>/g/ptg as a link to find the /ptg/ thread.

Remember the following:
>It doesn't matter if you use the same username in different trackers, the staff still share your IP with each other.
>No one is giving you an invite
>If starting out you should interview for RED, rank to elite, wait on account age and get invites from there. THAT'S IT THAT IS ALL YOU HAVE TO DO
>If you want to rank up on RED, spam recent deezer shit with deemix/smloadr.

Previous thread: >>105075417

Original filename: bourriquet.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [257] MARVEL JULY 2025 SOLICITATIONS
item.description:
FANTASTIC FOUR #1
RYAN NORTH (W) • HUMBERTO RAMOS (A/C) • VARIANT COVER BY ALEX ROSS
VARIANT COVER BY JEROME OPEÑA • VARIANT COVER BY CLIFF CHIANG
FOIL VARIANT COVER BY MAHMUD ASRAR • VARIANT COVER BY ALAN DAVIS
VARIANT COVER BY JEEHYUNG LEE • VIRGIN VARIANT COVER BY JEEHYUNG LEE
RETRO VISION VARIANT COVER BY LEONARDO ROMERO • VARIANT COVER BY TBA
REMASTERED VARIANT COVER BY JOHN BUSCEMA
2-PART CONNECTING MARVEL RIVALS VARIANT COVER BY NETEASE GAMES
DISNEY WHAT IF? FANTASTIC FOUR HOMAGE VARIANT COVER BY LORENZO PASTROVICCHIO
BLACK & WHITE DISNEY WHAT IF? FANTASTIC FOUR HOMAGE VARIANT COVER BY LORENZO PASTROVICCHIO
MARVEL STUDIOS VARIANT COVER ALSO AVAILABLE • BLANK VARIANT COVER ALSO AVAILABLE
A NEW ERA FOR MARVEL'S FIRST FAMILY!
• The FANTASTIC FOUR return with a new issue #1, kicking off a whole new volume of their adventures through time, space, science and the human condition!
• When the Fantastic Four take on Doom, things go well until they suddenly go catastrophically wrong – and they're sent to four different eras in Earth's history! Alone and isolated in wildly different time periods, Reed, Johnny, Ben and Sue all have to fight to survive.
• Their only hope is to reach the Forever Stone: a mass of dense granite that happens to be one of the longest-lasting rocks on the planet, which – through a combination of obscurity and raw geological luck – has stayed both intact and accessible for most of Earth's history!
• Also featured in this extra-big, extra-special issue: Ben Grimm fights a dinosaur! No other comic DARES to feature the Thing battling several Mapusauruses, but that's just where WE get started!
• And it's all brought to life by the incredible new series artist Humberto Ramos!
32 PGS./Rated T …$4.99

>Because the other thread made by the retard is genuinely pathetic

Original filename: FF2025001_Cov.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 91] I have OCD. A big obsession for me is off-gassing VOCs(that "new thing" smell),
item.description:
I have OCD. A big obsession for me is off-gassing VOCs(that "new thing" smell), especially in the context of computers, so much so that for the last 2 years, my computer has been a fanless ARM chromebook that uses 5W at max load. I'm worried that the VOCs emitted from a normal desktop computer will lower my IQ or cause a disease.

Does anybody have something to say that can help me? I've posted about this probably half a dozen times now, and I'm really sick of this chromebook. This is a major problem for me. I'm considering a macbook air, solely because they are fanless and don't use much power, but I obviously don't want one. I used to assemble desktops when I was a kid and enjoyed having a fast computer.

I've worked with a therapist for over a year trying to buy a normal computer but I back out every time. I've returned like a dozen computers at this point. This is a real post.

Original filename: 1632124079135.jpg

item.title: [ 42] /jpg/ - Japan General
item.description:
Kagura Edition

ー How do I travel by public transportation? ー
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

ー What should I see in <place>? ー
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

ーJR Passー
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting May 2024
>7 day Pass: ¥50,000
>14 day Pass: ¥80,000
>21 day Pass: ¥100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

ーInfo on Degeneracy ー
READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

>https://chn.cityheaven.net/
>https://rockitrisingsun.com
>https://paradise-tokyo.net
>https://hentaitokyo.com
>https://tokyoadultguide.com/

item.title: [178] /out/ings with a pipe
item.description:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

Original filename: 0687fd190525af3678814c5f459c2d0a.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
